adrFormatAddress: 2195 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text: The worse customer service ever!! Slow, rude, they don’t care even when i closed accounts, they just don’t care…especially the woman in the front supposedly greeting…. if you have a choice, stay away.

text.text: The worse customer service ever!! Slow, rude, they don’t care even when i closed accounts, they just don’t care…especially the woman in the front supposedly greeting…. if you have a choice, stay away.

originalText.text:
This is my first review, I never write them because I always try to be understanding as I work in customer service myself. But with this one I just can’t. Please, avoid this branch at all cost. Unless you want to waste your time and energy.
I had a few simple questions about opening a credit card, they put me on the wait list as I came in and I waited for 2 hours to be seen by a teller. I am not being dramatic or exaggerating. You might ask why didn’t you leave,the answer is because I already waisted all this time and was thinking well, how much longer can it possibly be? As it turned out more than two hours. There is only one person working in a cubicle who introduced himself as a manager. When he finally saw me, 2 minutes in our conversation someone called him, he got up and disappeared for another 15 minutes. When he came back he said it was his boss and he had to take the call. At this point I was done with them. He tried to explain that they are understaffed and blah and blah. I told him that he should hire more people, no one should be waiting for a service at the bank for more that 2 hours on a Monday. So I just got up and left. What a waste of my time!

originalText.text: I come here every month to withdraw cash for rent at the counter. Service has always been quick and the staff were very polite. Was surprised by the low rating; perhaps service wasn't as pleasant before I've moved here 3 months ago. If that's the case, it's gotten a lot better.

originalText.text: totally agree with the NY NY, the previous reviewer. I was at the branch. The teller line was extremely long! I waited for 20-30 mins for the teller. Only two tellers were available. They are not very friendly or professional in my pt of view. Many places to be improved!

originalText.text: 1 banker taking care of all the work! Never again, I've waited over 2 freaking hours to be seen by her, employees can definitely careless about you because they do no apologize for the wait or offer a cup of water or nothing! If I can rate this bank 0 stars I would! Worst customer service experience!!
